read_particle_list.f90

00001 module read_particle_list
00002     implicit none
00003     save
00004 
00005     real, allocatable :: p_R(:), p_z(:), 
00006         p_vPerp(:), p_vPar(:), p_weight(:) 
00007    
00008 contains    
00009     subroutine read_pl ()
00010         use constants
00011         use init_mpi
00012         use mpi
00013         use read_namelist
00014         use netcdf
00015         use dlg
00016 
00017         integer(kind=LONG) :: i
00018         real, dimension(nP) :: p_v
00019 
00020         real, allocatable :: p_psi(:), p_theta(:), p_E(:), p_lambda(:)
00021 
00022         real, allocatable :: nc_R(:), nc_z(:), nc_vPer(:), nc_vPar(:), nc_weight(:) 
00023         integer :: nc_nP, nc_id, R_id, z_id, vPer_id, vPar_id, weight_id, R_dim_ids(1)
00024 
00025         allocate ( p_R(nP), p_z(nP), p_weight(nP), &
00026             p_vPerp(nP), p_vPar(nP) )
00027 
00028             if ( pList_is_nCDF ) then 
00029 
00030             !   Read in variables from .nc particle list file
00031 
00032             call dlg_check ( nf90_open ( path = pl_fileName, mode = nf90_nowrite, ncid = nc_id ) )
00033             call dlg_check ( nf90_inq_varId ( nc_id, 'R', R_id ) )
00034             call dlg_check ( nf90_inq_varId ( nc_id, 'z', z_id ) )
00035             call dlg_check ( nf90_inq_varId ( nc_id, 'vPer', vPer_id ) )
00036             call dlg_check ( nf90_inq_varId ( nc_id, 'vPar', vPar_id ) )
00037             call dlg_check ( nf90_inq_varId ( nc_id, 'weight', weight_id ) )
00038             
00039             call dlg_check ( nf90_inquire_variable ( &
00040                 nc_id, R_id, dimIds = R_dim_ids ) )
00041             
00042             call dlg_check ( nf90_inquire_dimension ( nc_id, R_dim_ids(1), &
00043                 len = nc_nP ) ) 
00044             
00045             allocate ( nc_R ( nc_nP ), &
00046                 nc_z ( nc_nP ), &
00047                 nc_vPer ( nc_nP ), &
00048                 nc_vPar ( nc_nP ), &
00049                 nc_weight ( nc_nP ) )
00050 
00051             call dlg_check ( nf90_get_var ( nc_id, R_id, nc_R ) )
00052             call dlg_check ( nf90_get_var ( nc_id, z_id, nc_z ) )
00053             call dlg_check ( nf90_get_var ( nc_id, vPer_id, nc_vPer ) )
00054             call dlg_check ( nf90_get_var ( nc_id, vPar_id, nc_vPar ) )
00055             call dlg_check ( nf90_get_var ( nc_id, weight_id, nc_weight ) )
00056             
00057             call dlg_check ( nf90_close ( nc_id ) )
00058 
00059             p_R = nc_R(1:nP)
00060             p_z = nc_z(1:nP)
00061             p_vPerp = nc_vPer(1:nP)
00062             p_vPar  = nc_vPar(1:nP)
00063             p_weight    = nc_weight(1:nP)
00064  
00065         else
00066 
00067             !   Read in variables from .dav particle list file
00068 
00069             allocate ( p_psi(nP), p_theta(nP), &
00070                 p_E(nP), p_lambda(nP) )
00071            
00072             open ( unit = 8, file = pl_fileName, status = 'OLD', action = 'READ' )
00073 
00074             do i=1,nP
00075                
00076                 read (8,2000) p_psi(i), p_theta(i), &
00077                     p_R(i), p_z(i), p_E(i), p_lambda(i), p_weight(i)
00078 
00079             end do 
00080 
00081             2000 format ( 7e16.6 )
00082 
00083             close ( unit = 8 )
00084 
00085             !   Convert R,z to [m] from [cm]
00086 
00087             p_R = p_R * 1e-2
00088             p_z = p_z * 1e-2
00089 
00090             !   Calculate particle vPerp and vPar
00091 
00092             p_v = sqrt ( 2.0 * p_E * 1.0e3 * e_ / mi ) 
00093             p_vPar  = p_v * p_lambda
00094             p_vPerp = sqrt ( p_v**2 - p_vPar**2 )
00095 
00096             deallocate ( p_psi, p_E, p_lambda, p_theta )
00097 
00098         end if
00099 
00100     end subroutine read_pl
00101 
00102 end module read_particle_list
